app_descript:
Cleanfox

Brief: Cleanfox is a user-friendly app aimed at decluttering your email inbox by unsubscribing from unwanted newsletters and subscriptions. Echoing its environmental mission, Cleanfox not only cleans over 30 million emails but also takes an innovative approach to help reduce carbon footprints, making inbox management both productive and eco-friendly.
